desc:
Please can you check report central for agent invoices and agent invoices per agent. 
The report is showing a large amount of judgments not yet verified and the assumption is that it is counting the maintenance, divorce and maintenance substitution orders when it should not.
This billing run needs to exclude the maintenance and divorce orders until proper reports are designed to accommodate them.
If the assumption is correct, please correct the report so that billing can continue.
name: CW - ANTCCW052 - Agent invoices issue
